m_unbind_time, m.delete_flag m_delete_flag from fa_stock_ps sg left join fa_member m on sg.user_id = m.id
mapper.insert:
insert into fa_stock_ps
user_id, shengou_id, code, all_code, name, sg_fx_price, sg_hy_rate, sg_num, sg_nums, max_sg, status, money, create_time, update_time, zq_num, dj_money, sg_sg_date, sg_zq_jk_date, sg_ss_date, is_cc_time, is_cc, zq_money, is_tz, is_tz_time, zq_nums, delete_flag, sg_type, renjiao, renjiao_time, pay_later,
#{userId}, #{shengouId}, #{code}, #{allCode}, #{name}, #{sgFxPrice}, #{sgHyRate}, #{sgNum}, #{sgNums}, #{maxSg}, #{status}, #{money}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{zqNum}, #{djMoney}, #{sgSgDate}, #{sgZqJkDate}, #{sgSsDate}, #{isCcTime}, #{isCc}, #{zqMoney}, #{isTz}, #{isTzTime}, #{zqNums}, #{deleteFlag}, #{sgType}, #{renjiao}, #{renjiaoTime}, #{payLater},
mapper.delete: update fa_stock_ps set delete_flag = 1 where id = #{id}

update fa_stock_ps set delete_flag = 1 where id in
#{id}
